name: places/ChIJ-U-zGvqHwokRYrt6_8AZOWg
formattedAddress: 60 E 42nd St #764, New York, NY 10165, USA
adrFormatAddress: 60 E 42nd St #764, New York, NY 10165, USA

originalText.text: I could not recommend Flanzig & Flanzig more highly for their expertise, skill, professionalism and care. After being hit by a car, I was hospitalized for a month due to multiple fractures and surgeries and to undergo intensive physical therapy—during which time Daniel and his team took care of all the medical billing, insurance claims and legal paperwork so that my family and I could focus on my recovery. Throughout the duration of the matter, Daniel and his team continued to handle all the legal heavy-lifting and logistics/administration so that I wouldn’t be burdened, and Daniel was always communicative and proactive in providing updates and answering my questions. Thanks to Daniel’s work, experience and capability, I received a much more significant settlement on a much faster timeline than expected. I’ve recommended Flanzig & Flanzig to other friends seeking a personal injury attorney, and I am incredibly grateful to Daniel and his team for their continued work and care. Their time, understanding and expertise mean so much to me and my family for making an incredibly stressful and taxing situation much easier.

originalText.text: Exceptional lawyers with great client services. Ever since my accident they paid close attention to my needs and welcomed any questions. Any issue I had was met with a prompt response via phone or email. They made the process easy and produced results. I would definitely return if I ever needed their services again.

originalText.text: Flanzig and Flanzig is the best attorney you could possibly find. they did the best for me. The whole process from start to finish, was absolutely fantastic after a big nationwide law firm screwed up my case Danial was there to help me settle.  also, it’s my second experience with them. He is truly amazing person, honest, and a great human being. I definitely recommend them.

originalText.text: Daniel Flanzig and team have been an absolute pleasure to work with. The whole process from start to receiving the settlement was effortless and made me feel supported along the way. He maintained consistent communication throughout and made it a point to update me on progress. Despite my accident, it was such a sigh of relief working with someone who was truly passionate about fighting for what's right. Highly recommend Daniel Flanzig and team on any case, can't thank them enough!

originalText.text:
Meeting with Daniel Flanzig was one of the best decisions I’ve made after a bicycle accident that left me with medical bills and the inability to work for a few months.

I’ve never met with a personal injury lawyer before, let alone one that focuses on bicycle-related accidents.  I felt I had nothing to lose and if anything, I would recover my medical expenses

The pandemic definitely slowed the legal process, but Daniel kept me updated periodically.  I was patient and I knew he had many other cases, but at some point I wasn’t even sure if anything would come out of it  Then, one day I get a call from Daniel telling me there is a settlement and it was more than I anticipated.  Everything went smoothly after that.

I would definitely recommend reaching out to Flanzig & Flanzig!
